remoteClasses.name: NuboEarDetector
remoteClasses.doc: NuboEarDetector interface. Documentation about the module

methods.name: showEars
methods.doc: Show or Hide the ears in the video stream

params.name: viewEars
params.doc: Determines wheter the detected ears will be displayed or not

methods.name: detectByEvent
methods.doc: To indicate  the algorithm if process all the images or only when it receives an specific event

params.name: event
params.doc: 0 (default) => process all the frames without constraints; 1 => process only when we receive a specific event. (At the moment there are not any event to make this algorithm works. Therefore, this property should not be used at te moment

methods.name: sendMetaData
methods.doc: The ears and the profile faces detected (x,y,width,height) are sent as metadata

params.name: metaData
params.doc: 0 (default) => metadata are not sent; 1 => metadata are sent

methods.name: multiScaleFactor
methods.doc: Specify how much the image size is reduced at each haar image

methods.name: widthToProcess
methods.doc: this will be the width of the image that the algorithm is going to process to detect ears
